articles.description: The Brazilian centre back has enjoyed a rapid rise after forcing his way into Roma's first team during the restart of the 2019-2020 season and has now cemented his place as a regular starter.
articles.content:
Liverpool face competition from Arsenal for £35million Roma defender Roger Ibanez, according to reports.
The Brazilian centre back has enjoyed a rapid rise after forcing his way into Roma's first te… [+1698 chars]

articles.title: Pochettino Has RUINED His Career. - HITC Sport
articles.description: The Irish Guy takes a look at Mauricio Pochettino's new job at PSG and whether Manchester United will regret this.
